name: Kinguin API for WooCommerce
author: iLabs.dev

sections.description:
Import over 70,000 digital products to your online store, including video games, software, gift cards and in-game content.

Features

  • 70,000 digital products, including:
    ** Video game keys for numerous platforms, including Steam, Origin, Uplay or GOG.
    ** Gift cards for popular CS:GO stores, including Gamdom, DuelBits or CSGO Empire
    ** Computer software, including Windows, antivirus or security software
  • Automated key-delivery via email
  • Support 24/7
  • Free of charge
  • Full automation
  • Special discounts on digital products
  • Ready products’ descriptions and images
  • Automated or manual pricing options

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload kinguin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How to connect Woocommerce with Kinguin marketplace:

  1. Set up your API Key from Kinguin personal store dashboard and save webhooks in store’s settings
  2. Import products from Kinguin into your Woocommerce shop.
sections.changelog:
1.0.7

  • New settings
  • Fix in the mechanism for sending keys for orders in the status ‘on-hold’.

1.0.6

  • Reducing the import step for manual import to avoid interruption.
  • Correction in the mechanism for sending keys for orders in the status ‘on-hold’.

1.0.5

  • Divide products to categories during import.
  • Some small fixs and improvements.

1.0.4

  • New filtering options allow you to import only products that meet your criteria.
  • New sales options for flexible pricing.
  • Fixed problem with infinite import via webhook.

1.0.3

  • Fixed incorrect response code for webhooks.
  • Changed order of setting fields to match order in API client area.

1.0.2

  • Added the necessary stylesheets and scripts.
  • Fixed issue with Cron schedule.
  • Tested with WordPress 6.0 RC1.

1.0.1

  • Fixed error with memory limit on some servers.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: Integrate your Woocommerce store with Kinguin marketplace. This tool allows you to import games from Kinguin into your Woocommerce shop.
